entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 10 January 2023
